title: Enhancing Occupational Health and Hygiene Research Competencies: Gamification-Based PBL Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Theories and Research Methodologies in Occupational Health and Hygiene
context.additional_context: Learners use personal devices (BYOD) for team research projects, engaging in activity-based education combining storytelling and gamification elements

learning_goals: Learners can formulate Q1 journal publication strategies by concretizing OHH field research topics through team-based storytelling.
Participants can accurately apply research proposal writing and evaluation criteria in a gamified environment with over 80% accuracy.
After completing the training, over 90% of learners can form research collaboration networks and present actual research project plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
